alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 2:27AM CDT until August 10 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLEBURNE AND NORTHWESTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 227 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pangburn, or near Heber Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Crosby... Letona... Dam Site Marina... Wilburn... Center Hill... Sidon... Hopewell in Cleburne County... Joy... Pickens in White County... Armstrong Springs... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
